General.Name: Sindoh
General.Description: sindoh Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells office products in Korea and internationally. It offers digital color and mono multi-function printers; color and mono laser printers; fax machines; production printers; UV printers; and supplies, such as thermal paper products. The company was founded in 1960 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
